replies.body: About 2 days and 2 hours when we had 7 days, I have to say I am surprised.
I'm surprised you guys crushed it!!

wrong, it started from 8 days. so 3 days 2 hours. lol

i got 3 points on this, and my main. so thats good! now for naut to win the vote!
From what i can tell, they didn't take into their calculations of ocean week that all the champs were free week.
What do you use to make the gifs?
How do we vote for the statue?
